body:
Git can be used mostly without perl, except maybe for interactive add

```
$ git add -i
fatal: git was built without support for git-add--interactive (NO_PERL=1).
```

Since git is a dependency of spack and sometimes a build dependency for other packages, it would be nice to have a minimal version of git.

Also I believe they're writing interactive add in C to avoid the dependency on perl, so soon the perl dep could potentially be dropped by default?
title: Add perl variant to git to build without perl
